pros: I have worked at Together Trust for 5 years. The Trust looks after it’s employees with pay and benefits but also support. There are lots of career opportunities and you are supported to progress. The young people are at the forefront of everything the Trust does and better outcomes for them is the most important thing.
cons: There isn’t any negatives from my experience.
